title: MD
biography: Shubha Tole' is an Indian neuroscientist, professor and principal Investigator at the Tata Institute of Fundamental Research in Mumbai, India. Her research investigates the development and evolution of the mammalian brain. In 2014, she won the Infosys Prize in the Life Sciences category.
aiSummary: Shubha Tole is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 39 at Developmental neuroscience (Member). Has been published in Science, Journal of Neuroscience, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
